# 13 Wed

## \[AI 스쿨 1기\] 6주차 DAY 3

출처 : [https://github.com/sujiny-tech/k-digital-training-AI-dev/blob/main/Machine-Learning-basics/Linear%20Models%20for%20Classification.md](https://github.com/sujiny-tech/k-digital-training-AI-dev/blob/main/Machine-Learning-basics/Linear%20Models%20for%20Classification.md)

### 선형 분류\(Linear Classification\)

* 분류 목표 : 입력벡터 **x**를 **K**개의 가능한 클래스 중 하나의 클래스로 할당
* 분류를 위한 결정이론
  * **확률적 모델\(probabilistic model\)**
    * 생성모델\(generative model\)

      > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.) 클래스의 사후확률 \(using 베이즈 정리\) 또는 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/85d663d7e7f13f8653de60c572ba23737bbfc4031108620e3e3a1f836364c4e9/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70287b5c62662673706163653b787d7c5c6d61746863616c7b437d5f6b29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/85d663d7e7f13f8653de60c572ba23737bbfc4031108620e3e3a1f836364c4e9/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70287b5c62662673706163653b787d7c5c6d61746863616c7b437d5f6b29) 직접 모델링

    * 식별모델\(discriminative model\)

      > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f50fb3f03bfc175599b7ab7868e0b25e95c58314c4682f05db3c5a876831ecbf/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746863616c7b437d5f6b7c7b5c62662673706163653b787d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f50fb3f03bfc175599b7ab7868e0b25e95c58314c4682f05db3c5a876831ecbf/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746863616c7b437d5f6b7c7b5c62662673706163653b787d29) 직접 모델링
  * **판별함수\(discriminant model\)**

    > 확률 계산 없이 입력 **x**를 클래스로 할당하는 판별함수 구하기\(찾기\)

### 

### 판별함수 \(Discriminant model\)

* 선형함수에 관한 판별함수에 대해 생각하자.
* 두개의 클래스에 대한 선형판별함수

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/95895788c61a03ea8c0bdb33548997b8357c0bab5102bfb6c9138287884235d7/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d7b5c62662673706163653b775e54787d2b775f30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/95895788c61a03ea8c0bdb33548997b8357c0bab5102bfb6c9138287884235d7/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d7b5c62662673706163653b775e54787d2b775f30)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4945c5a93ce326101c85c5d7b20ecd9cdee0156f8352cc6aef6ced3ace63e1f5/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c62662673706163653b77)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4945c5a93ce326101c85c5d7b20ecd9cdee0156f8352cc6aef6ced3ace63e1f5/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c62662673706163653b77) : wight vector

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e32ab3273af0ac138ba214d0976947d5413f31ba23cf7ce4a90e1624bdf33546/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775f30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e32ab3273af0ac138ba214d0976947d5413f31ba23cf7ce4a90e1624bdf33546/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775f30) : bias

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1a163bec18e3826b229258921da921cc3f9391026a68a5cf84529bcbfe668262/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d292673706163653b5c67652673706163653b30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/1a163bec18e3826b229258921da921cc3f9391026a68a5cf84529bcbfe668262/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d292673706163653b5c67652673706163653b30)이면 클래스 1로 판별, &lt;0이면 클래스 2로 판별

* **결정 경계\(decision boundary\)**
  * y\(**x**\)=0을 만족하는 **x**의 집합 \(**x**가 D차원의 입력벡터일 때, D-1차원의 hyperplane\)
  * 결정 경계면 위 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/60e088aa2fedd93516dc8325c78a0471d75a512f5df07b8465f275e31b86b00d/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f7b5c62662673706163653b787d5f412c2673706163653b7b5c62662673706163653b787d5f42)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/60e088aa2fedd93516dc8325c78a0471d75a512f5df07b8465f275e31b86b00d/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f7b5c62662673706163653b787d5f412c2673706163653b7b5c62662673706163653b787d5f42)

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d96f64695f28a512b2e2d27195501a9396dbe211855e4eeac2ae4aa60f860b4b/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d5f41293d79287b5c62662673706163653b787d5f42293d30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d96f64695f28a512b2e2d27195501a9396dbe211855e4eeac2ae4aa60f860b4b/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d5f41293d79287b5c62662673706163653b787d5f42293d30)

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d4226d7dd582fc02630a10dfccd55bf68514747e31519afd935d7ed5be71b1f3/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f7b5c62662673706163653b775e547d287b5c62662673706163653b787d5f412d7b5c62662673706163653b787d5f42293d30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d4226d7dd582fc02630a10dfccd55bf68514747e31519afd935d7ed5be71b1f3/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f7b5c62662673706163653b775e547d287b5c62662673706163653b787d5f412d7b5c62662673706163653b787d5f42293d30) → 즉, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fc46a53d45ee5166334375c02f3811ee9a17185a5c0c10c8e647da3803a5243b/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775e7b547d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fc46a53d45ee5166334375c02f3811ee9a17185a5c0c10c8e647da3803a5243b/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775e7b547d)는 결정경계면에 수직

  * 원점에서 결정 경계면까지의 거리
    * 벡터 x⊥ : 원점에서 결정 경계면에 대한 사영\(projection\)일 때 \(아래 그림 참고\)

      > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f591f1f686cfd2292d298876fa4c123efa8506abc8afab6a3d06de20da87af5e/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775f303c30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f591f1f686cfd2292d298876fa4c123efa8506abc8afab6a3d06de20da87af5e/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775f303c30)이면, 결정 경계면은 원점으로부터 **w**가 향하는 방향으로 멀어져있음.

      > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/16bbf93fc2d6848d180ae788a3a1cd7b2011072eb66874e0c308a00339f8ee94/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775f303e30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/16bbf93fc2d6848d180ae788a3a1cd7b2011072eb66874e0c308a00339f8ee94/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775f303e30)이면, 결정 경계면은 원점으로부터 **w**가 반대 방향으로 멀어져있음.

      > 즉, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e32ab3273af0ac138ba214d0976947d5413f31ba23cf7ce4a90e1624bdf33546/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775f30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e32ab3273af0ac138ba214d0976947d5413f31ba23cf7ce4a90e1624bdf33546/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f775f30)는 결정 경계면 위치 결정❗

    * x⊥ : 임의의 한점 **x**의 결정 경계면에 대한 사영일 때

      > y\(**x**\)는 **x**와 결정 경계면 사이의 부호화된 거리에 비례

      > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

      > 정리하면,

      > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/7fb2c1c5a8fbed458199478c16cbea19d31c4e78b5e686b99dfc0d2834f940ee/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d292673706163653b3c2673706163653b30)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/7fb2c1c5a8fbed458199478c16cbea19d31c4e78b5e686b99dfc0d2834f940ee/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d292673706163653b3c2673706163653b30)이면, **x**는 결정 경계면 기준으로 **-w**가 향하는 방향에 있음.

* **다수의 클래스**에 대한 판별함수
  * 클래스 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/9d54f564153be43c46b0b05615494cc78561b4c3265fd08c30b1037735015385/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f6b3d312c5c6c646f74732c4b)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/9d54f564153be43c46b0b05615494cc78561b4c3265fd08c30b1037735015385/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f6b3d312c5c6c646f74732c4b)에 대해 표현하면 다음과 같음.

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2aa676cebe8cae56b4810c4b867ce73eec19285a1334e0276bb11dd76363c978/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f6a7b5c6e65717d6b)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2aa676cebe8cae56b4810c4b867ce73eec19285a1334e0276bb11dd76363c978/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f6a7b5c6e65717d6b)일 때, [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/899a247acd128451fc6fbd319196e3f3019a93a2a0a528653d1c0878aa0aa089/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f795f6b287b5c62662673706163653b787d293e795f6a287b5c62662673706163653b787d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/899a247acd128451fc6fbd319196e3f3019a93a2a0a528653d1c0878aa0aa089/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f795f6b287b5c62662673706163653b787d293e795f6a287b5c62662673706163653b787d29)를 만족하면, x를 클래스 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2e66445ba82f07800a0584b4ff999c559ec1cbf2d5dc95b05c856c630d0ba653/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f435f6b)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2e66445ba82f07800a0584b4ff999c559ec1cbf2d5dc95b05c856c630d0ba653/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f435f6b)로 판별

### 분류를 위한 최소제곱법 \(Least squares for classification\)

* **사실 분류를 위해 최소제곱법 쓰는건 별로 좋지 x**❗
* 클래스를 판별하는 판별식은 다음과 같음

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/830c6097501f886f795efd3bc62f763f64f91ebe7709c434495866e3db29b252/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f795f6b287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d7b5c62662673706163653b777d6b5e547b5c62662673706163653b787d2b777b6b307d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/830c6097501f886f795efd3bc62f763f64f91ebe7709c434495866e3db29b252/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f795f6b287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d7b5c62662673706163653b777d6b5e547b5c62662673706163653b787d2b777b6b307d)

  > 행렬 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d3a84f8948fccfcf3629434003d15ec76af95ffeba04d134d57f1077bd401a66/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c74696c64657b577d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d3a84f8948fccfcf3629434003d15ec76af95ffeba04d134d57f1077bd401a66/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c74696c64657b577d)에 대해 나타내면,

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/10a5ac628bdd721fb77c793eb73647c55326db650157b978c292141374a33cda/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d5c74696c64657b577d5e545c74696c64657b5c62662673706163653b787d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/10a5ac628bdd721fb77c793eb73647c55326db650157b978c292141374a33cda/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d5c74696c64657b577d5e545c74696c64657b5c62662673706163653b787d)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d3a84f8948fccfcf3629434003d15ec76af95ffeba04d134d57f1077bd401a66/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c74696c64657b577d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/d3a84f8948fccfcf3629434003d15ec76af95ffeba04d134d57f1077bd401a66/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c74696c64657b577d)의 k번째 열 : [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4e81ec31b7ba577b2dfc90ccd27f671a7aeef4b1bd3618d310d555030806b50c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c74696c64657b777d5f6b3d28775f7b6b307d2c2673706163653b7b5c62662673706163653b777d5f6b5e54295e542673706163653b5c)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4e81ec31b7ba577b2dfc90ccd27f671a7aeef4b1bd3618d310d555030806b50c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c74696c64657b777d5f6b3d28775f7b6b307d2c2673706163653b7b5c62662673706163653b777d5f6b5e54295e542673706163653b5c)

* **제곱합 에러 함수\(sum-of-squared error function\)**

n번째항이 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fdb289e4af773062d38e358f9c1d5041d031cbc5ed26a5df0d7fe22979d6ca67/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f7b5c62662673706163653b747d5f6e5e54)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/fdb289e4af773062d38e358f9c1d5041d031cbc5ed26a5df0d7fe22979d6ca67/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f7b5c62662673706163653b747d5f6e5e54)인 주어졌을 때, 제곱합 에러함수는 다음과 같음.

### 퍼셉트론 알고리즘 \(The perceptron algorithm\)

* 기저함수를 넣어 일반화된 식으로 표현하면 다음과 같음.

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/689519336146df600271aed4e01f9236855ac75ee2264cf0813f3d394f01de35/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d66287b5c62662673706163653b777d5e545c706869287b5c62662673706163653b787d2929)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/689519336146df600271aed4e01f9236855ac75ee2264cf0813f3d394f01de35/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f79287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d66287b5c62662673706163653b777d5e545c706869287b5c62662673706163653b787d2929)

  > 여기서 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a006de13b37d0892550ad43195eda793a17ce030bc0556e7bf79be4a2794f10c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c7068695f30287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d31)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a006de13b37d0892550ad43195eda793a17ce030bc0556e7bf79be4a2794f10c/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c7068695f30287b5c62662673706163653b787d293d31)이며, f는 활성함수\(activation function\)로 계단형 함수임

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

* 에러 함수

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a1634889cea918079ca3f5c884eda87e3dcea702029c3cc953e3e9e927069dc0/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746863616c7b4d7d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/a1634889cea918079ca3f5c884eda87e3dcea702029c3cc953e3e9e927069dc0/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c6d61746863616c7b4d7d) : 잘못 분류된 데이터들의 집합

* Stochastic gradient descent의 적용하면,

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

* 위 업데이트가 실행될 때 잘못 분류된 샘플에 미치는 영향

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

⭐ 최소제곱법과 퍼셉트론 모두 output 출력하지만, 확률을 계산하진 않음❗

### 

### 확률적 생성 모델 \(Probabilistic Generative Models\)

* [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/db6c0e15c1a7ea290fb1cda27ccbb8a2355d692a932b129f4ddb8bb10cfb5531/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d7c435f6b292c2673706163653b7028435f6b29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/db6c0e15c1a7ea290fb1cda27ccbb8a2355d692a932b129f4ddb8bb10cfb5531/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f70285c6d61746862667b787d7c435f6b292c2673706163653b7028435f6b29) 모델링 한 다음 → 클래스의 사후확률 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2f7c3f81e526c05ecfd36fdcf14c217445fee4843cb6c744c1f656910569f5bc/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f7028435f6b7c5c6d61746862667b787d29)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/2f7c3f81e526c05ecfd36fdcf14c217445fee4843cb6c744c1f656910569f5bc/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f7028435f6b7c5c6d61746862667b787d29)을 구함❗ \(using 베이즈 정리\)
* 이전 **판별함수**에서는 **에러함수를 최소화하는 최적의 파라미터를 찾는 것**이 목적이지만, **확률적 모델**은 **데이터 분포를 모델링**하면서 분류 문제를 결과적으로 풀게됨❗
* 2-class를 가정하고, x가 클래스 1\(C1\)에 속할 확률

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.) \(a에 관한 **logistic sigmoid function**\)

  > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e0e93072fa6185b6427c1f47f25aee0af0eef01464b57cf2ea535ea1e827f02e/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f613d5c6c6e7b5c64667261637b70287b5c62662673706163653b787d7c435f31297028435f31297d7b70287b5c62662673706163653b787d7c435f32297028435f32297d7d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/e0e93072fa6185b6427c1f47f25aee0af0eef01464b57cf2ea535ea1e827f02e/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f613d5c6c6e7b5c64667261637b70287b5c62662673706163653b787d7c435f31297028435f31297d7b70287b5c62662673706163653b787d7c435f32297028435f32297d7d)

  * **logistic sigmoid function**

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f1359fe649314e83b1e379a0e0b78390605f8cd2e034a55d168856e4984c5c7d/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c7369676d612861293d5c64667261637b317d7b312b5c657870282d61297d)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/f1359fe649314e83b1e379a0e0b78390605f8cd2e034a55d168856e4984c5c7d/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f5c7369676d612861293d5c64667261637b317d7b312b5c657870282d61297d)

    > [![](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72974863/104664910-bd7ccd00-5713-11eb-82d3-b18e090adb63.png)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72974863/104664910-bd7ccd00-5713-11eb-82d3-b18e090adb63.png)

    > [sigmoid 함수-위키백과 참고](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72974863/104664910-bd7ccd00-5713-11eb-82d3-b18e090adb63.png)

    * 성질

### 데이터가 이산일 때 \(Discrete features\)

* 각 특성 [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/b6a906455f65aecad5c810ddee41cc4258da141666e40fe53d3e73e2d272d535/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f785f69)](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/b6a906455f65aecad5c810ddee41cc4258da141666e40fe53d3e73e2d272d535/68747470733a2f2f6c617465782e636f6465636f67732e636f6d2f6769662e6c617465783f785f69)이 0 또는 1, 하나의 값만 가질 수 있는 경우
  * 클래스가 주어졌을 때 특성들이 **조건부 독립\(conditional independence\)이라는 가정**을 할 경우 문제는 단순화됨! → **naive Bayes** 가정

    > [![](https://camo.githubusercontent.)](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

## \[Statistics 110\]

#### Present Part \[3 / 34\]

### 3강- Birthday Problem과 확률의 특성 \(Birthday Problem, Properties of Probability\)

#### 생일 문제 : 생일이 같은 두 명의 사람을 찾기

* 가정
  * 2월 29일은 제외한다
  * 365일이 모두 동일한 확률을 가진다
    * 실제로는 그렇지 않다. 예를 들어 9월에 출생이 많다.
    * 독립 : 한 사람의 생일이 다른 사람의 생일에 영향을 미치지 않는다.

#### 최소한 몇명의 사람이 있어야 50%의 확률을 만족할까?

* 365개의 상자에 공을 최소한 하나씩 집어넣는 경우와 동일
* 사람이 366명일 경우는 확률이 1이다.
  * 이를 비둘기집 원리라고 한다
* 대부분의 사람들은 직관적으로 150~180명을 이야기하며 보통 100을 넘는다.
* 실제로는 23명이 있을 때 50.7%의 확률을 가진다

#### 모두의 생일이 같지 않을 확률

* 이를 1에서 빼면 적어도 두 명이 생일이 같을 확률을 구하는 것과 같다
* P\(no match\) = $$ \frac {365 \cdot 364 \cdot \ \ \cdots \ \ \cdot (365 - k + 1)} {365^k}$$ : 365개의 날짜 중 1명이 한 날짜를 차지하면 다른 1명은 남은 364개의 날짜 중 한 날짜를 차지하는 방법
* P\(match\)
  * 50.7% if k = 23
  * 97.0% if k = 50
  * 99.999% if k = 100

#### k에 대한 직관

* $$ {k \choose 2} = {k(k-1) \over 2} $$
* $$ {23 \choose 2} = {23 \cdot 22 \over 2} = 253 $$
  * 23은 작은 수지만, 23명이 만들 수 있는 쌍의 수는 253개이며 충분히 적어도 한쌍이 생일이 같은지 비교할 수로는 작은 수는 아니다
* 생일이 같거나 하루 차이 날 확률
  * about 50% if k = 14



#### 확률 정리

* 기본 정리
  * P\($$\varnothing$$\) = 0, P\(S\) = 1 and it also means $$ 0 \le P(A) \le 1 $$
  * $$ P (\cup^\infty_{n=1}) = \sum^\infty_{n=1}P(A_n)  \ \ \ \ if \ \ A_n \ \ is \ \ disjoint\ \ with \ \ A_m(m \not= n)$$
* 속성
  * $$ P(A^c) = 1 - P(A) $$
    * Proof 
      * $$ 1= P(S) = P(A \bigcup A^c) = P(A) + P(A^c) \ \ since A \bigcap A^c = \varnothing $$
  * If $$ A \subseteq B $$, then $$ P(A) \leq P(B) $$
    * Proof
      * $$ B = A \bigcup (B \bigcap A^c) $$, disjoint
      * $$ P(B) = P(A) \bigcup P(B \bigcap A^c) $$
  * $$ P(A \bigcup B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A \bigcap B) $$
    * Proof
      * $$ P(A \bigcup B) = P(A \bigcup (B \bigcap A^c)) = P(A) + P(B \bigcap A^c) ?= P(A) + P(B) - P(A \bigcap B) $$
      * $$ P(B) = P(A \bigcap B) + P(A^c \bigcap B) $$ =&gt; True
      * since,  $$ P(A \bigcap B), P(A^c \bigcap B) $$are disjoint, union is B
    * 포함배제의 원리, inclusion-exclusion
  * $$ P(A_1 \bigcup A_2 \bigcup \cdots \bigcup A_n) = \sum_{i=1} ^n P(A_i) - \sum_{i \lt j} P(A_i \bigcap A_j) + \sum_{i \lt j \lt k} P(A_i \bigcap A_j \bigcap A_k) - \cdots + (-1)^{n+1}P(A_i \bigcap \cdots \bigcap A_n)$$

#### 

#### 몽모르트 문제 : 드 몽모르트가 만든 문제

* 도박에서 처음 나온 문제
* 1부터 n까지 적혀있고 각 수마다 한 장만 존재하는 카드 뭉치가 존재
* 카드를 셔플 후, 카드 뭉치에 있는 카드의 순서와 카드의 값이 일치하는 경우 승리
* 포함배제의 원리를 이용하여 푸는 것이 가장 쉽다
* $$ P(A_j) = {1 \over n} $$, j카드가 j-th에 있을 확률, 이 때 j에 대한 식이 아니다
* $$ P(A_1 \bigcap A_2) = { (n-2)! \over n!} = {1 \over n(n-1)} $$, n개의 카드 중 1과 2가 각각 첫번째와 두번째에 있어야 함
* $$ P(A_1 \bigcap \cdots \bigcap A_K) = { (n-k)! \over n!}$$
* $$ P(A_1 \bigcup \cdots \bigcup A_K) = n \cdot {1 \over n} - {n(n-1) \over 2! }{1 \over n(n-1)} + { n(n-1)(n-2) \over 3! }{1 \over (n(n-1)(n-2)} - \cdots \\ = 1 - {1 \over 2!} + \cdots + (-1)^n {1 \over n!} = 1 - {1 \over e}$$
* 테일러 급수와 비슷한 모양
